projects.title: Android App: Social Media App for Campus
projects.description: A social media platform for students to post pictures, ask questions, sell items, and access information like the mess menu and other campus services.

projects.title: Android Game: Dino Running
projects.description: A mobile game developed using Dart and Flutter with integrated Google AdSense for advertisements.

projects.title: MIDI/DJ Controller with Arduino
projects.description: Developed using an Arduino Nano for analog-to-digital conversion and three 16-channel multiplexers for 32 analog and 16 digital inputs. Interfaced with VirtualDJ software via a virtual serial port to MIDI converter.

projects.title: DVI output with RP2040
projects.description: Implemented DVI output on a 32" LCD screen using a Raspberry Pi Pico and a GitHub repository. Added a real-time clock to create a stopwatch for a conference or talk use.

projects.title: AID-BOT: Homemade Autonomous UAV
projects.description: Utilized an Arduino Nano as the flight controller and additional Arduino units to construct the transmitter and receiver. Built a fixed-wing craft using repurposed materials, capable of manually dropping a payload of approximately 400g.

projects.title: Web App: Sugar Coaster
projects.description: A game designed to enhance the understanding of glycemic responses in various daily-consumed foods, targeting audiences from children to diabetic patients.
